name: tfoot
summary: The `<tfoot>` HTML element defines a set of rows summarizing the columns of the table.
tagOmission: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent table element.
permittedParents: A table element. The tfoot must appear after any caption, colgroup, thead, tbody, or tr element. Note that this is the requirement as of HTML5.In HTML4, the tfoot element cannot be placed after any tbody and tr element. Note that this directly contradicts the above normative requirement from HTML5.
